title: Disappointed
text: Was in NYC on biz and had always wanted to stay at the place I used to party years back. This hotel is in a great location and still has a good chic vibe at lobby level. But once you exit the elevator to head to your hotel room everything goes wrong. The hall decore is horrible. They make the narrow halls seem even smaller by putting in port holes so you feel like you are in a submarine. Then you enter the tiny rooms that you have to walk sideways to get into bed. Wanna take a shower? Better hope you don't get the tub with 2cm thick dirt at the bottom. Hope you are not sick. The AC decided to blast on me at 2am late winter.
